discourse_list.title: BlockQuick - Secure super light client for Ethereum

content.content: We released our research results earlier this week. A new super light client protocol, decentralized and eclipse resistant. Needing just 20kb to sync to Ethereum. Here is the paper: Cryptology ePrint Archive: Report 2019/579 - BlockQuick: Super-Light Client Protocol for Blockchain Validation on Constrained Devices and the announcement: Blockquick Super Light Blockchain Client For Trustless Time The first use case we’re addressing is to use decentralized PKI (DPKI) from those small IoT devices.
